availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Garrison English (Sacramento County, California, broker and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Sacramento County, California, broker and commissioner of deeds. New York native. Married to Elizabeth C. Anderson English in Sacramento County, California, in 1857. Father of L. G. English. Broker in Sacramento County in 1860. Employed Ah Tom as a servant in Sacramento County in 1860. Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in Sacramento County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, California, Sacramento County, Sacramento, Ward 4, p. 608.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, California, Sacramento County, Sacramento, Ward 4, p. 291B-292A.
California, County Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1830-1980, California Department of Public Health, p. 501 of 1953 on microfilm (accessed on Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "William Garrison English (1818-1878)," Memorial #105714424, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/105714424 (accessed June 15, 2021).
